name: CyPolice MechDrone - Silent Sweeper
text:
1 "Cypolice" monster
Cannot be Link Summoned to the Extra Monster Zone. When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "CyPolice" monster, you can target up to 2 Set cards on your opponent's side of the field, and if you do, reveal them. Then, you can discard 1 card and, if you do, destroy one of the revealed cards. You can only use the effect of "CyPolice MechDrone - Silent Sweeper" once per turn.
